snippet.title: Ball Posse - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=ball.posse
iOS, iPhone, iPad: https://apps.apple.com/app/id1521699005

Ball Posse is a new puzzle physics platform video game rolled out where you tilt your way through super breathtaking challenging levels.

Run and roll with our hero in a ball to avoid obstacles and collect unique Ball Posse gems.

FEATURES:

- Control the ball with joystick or tilt your device (with calibration)
- Simple gameplay
- Play in portrait or landscape screen orientation
- Optimized for all mobile devices
- Challenge your friends with best level times
- Run through super handmade levels and more is coming soon

This game is updated constantly.
A team of 10-50 is working hard for you to give you the best experience.
Next updates with more levels, new special characters in balls to collect all the gems and much more.

***

Send your feedback to support@ballposse.com

Send an email with subject 'Subscribe' to newsletter@ballposse.com to get game update news.

***

http://www.Zypong.com

http://www.BallPosse.com

http://www.facebook.com/BallPosse

http://www.instagram.com/Ball.Posse

http://www.twitter.com/BallPosse

https://www.youtube.com/user/Zypong?sub_confirmation=1

Join our Discord:
https://www.discord.gg/A5p4wSPJGt

***

Want to help us? Please rate our game (^_^)

Don't forget to Subscribe, Like and click on the notification bell under the video.

***
